privacy_note: Muna sadaukar da kanmu wajen kare sirrinku. Ba za mu tattara bayananku ba sai da izinin ku.

hero_subtitle: HaÉ—a damar Afirka da mafita na kasuwanci masu dabaru
seo_description: Muna karfafa kamfanoni, mutane, da kungiyoyi a Afirka ta Kudu da mafita wajen kafa kasuwanci, shige da fice, shugabanci, da samar da kayayyakin ofis.
about_slogan: HaÉ—a damar Afirka da mafita na kasuwanci masu dabaru
about_company_description: SubSaharan Investment Link Group wata kamfani ce ta shawara daga Afirka ta Kudu da ke ba da mafita kan kasuwanci, shige da fice, shugabanci, da kayayyakin ofis a yankin Afirka ta Kudu. Manufarmu ita ce karfafa 'yan kasuwa, kamfanoni, da mutane ta hanyar samar da mafita masu sauÆ™i, don inganta ci gaba mai dorewa da haÉ—in kai a tsakanin Æ™asashen yankin.
about_mission_content: Muna burin karfafa kasuwanci da mutane ta hanyar samar da cikakkun mafita da ke inganta ci gaban tattalin arziki da Æ™arfafa haÉ—in kai tsakanin Æ™asashe. Muna son zama ginshiki wajen kawo ci gaba mai dorewa da wadata a Afirka ta Kudu.
about_overview_content: SubSaharan Investment Link Group kamfani ne na shawara daga Afirka ta Kudu da ke da burin karfafa kamfanoni, mutane, da Æ™ungiyoyi a Afirka ta Kudu. Muna ba da tallafi mai inganci wajen kafa kamfani, shige da fice, shugabanci, da bayar da kayayyakin ofis.
about_vision_content: Manufarmu ita ce mu zama masana a fagen samar da mafita na kasuwanci da dokoki a Afirka ta Kudu, ta hanyar samar da ci gaba mai dorewa da haÉ—in kai a yankin.
about_services_intro: Gano manyan bangarorin ayyukanmu. Latsa kowanne don Æ™arin bayani.

Taimako wajen samun takardar shaidar 'yan sanda ta Afirka ta Kudu

seo_about_title: Game da Mu | SubSaharan Investment Link Group
seo_about_description: Sanin SubSaharan Investment Link Group, manufarmu, burimmu, da ayyukan da muke yi don karfafa kamfanoni da mutane a Afirka ta Kudu.

connect_description_1: A SubSaharan Investment Link Group, muna ba da mafita masu sauÆ™i da aminci don kafa kamfani, hijira, shugabanci, da ayyukan ofis a Afirka ta Kudu.
connect_description_2: Tare da kwarewa a yankin da kulawa akan ci gaba mai dorewa, muna bada damar ga kamfanoni da mutane su bunkasa cikin kwanciyar hankali.
connect_description_3: HaÉ—a kai da mu a yau â€” mu ne hanyar ku zuwa nasara a Afirka ta Kudu.

contact_us_description: Shirye ku canza tunani zuwa gaskiya? Muna nan don taimaka muku cim ma burinku.
contact_page_subtitle: Muna son jin ra'ayin ku! Ku haÉ—a kai da mu don mu yi aiki tare.
contact_description: Tuntube mu don Æ™arin bayani game da ayyukanmu da yadda za mu iya haÉ—in gwiwa.
seo_contact_title: Tuntube Mu | SubSaharan Investment Link Group
seo_contact_description: HaÉ—a kai da SubSaharan Investment Link Group. Muna ba da mafita kan kafa kamfani, hijira, shugabanci, da ayyukan ofis a Afirka ta Kudu.
Business Valuation & Investment Readines: Kimanta Kasuwanci da Shiryeâ€‘Shiryen Zuba Jari

seo_services_description: Gano ayyukanmu na dabaru, ciki har da shawara, bin doka, hijira, da Æ™ari a Afirka ta Kudu.
services_business_consulting_description: Dabarar shiga kasuwa, tsareâ€‘tsaren kasuwanci da tsari, da shawarwari na musamman don bunkasa kasuwanci.
services_business_strategy_description: Ci gaban tsareâ€‘tsaren kasuwanci, nazarin yiwuwa, tsareâ€‘tsaren dabaru da shiryeâ€‘shiryen tayin aiki.
services_business_registration_descripti: Rajistar kamfani, rahotannin shekaraâ€‘shekara, haraji, Bâ€‘BBEE, COIDA/UIF da bin ka'idoji.
services_business_valuation_description: Kimanta kasuwanci, nazarin hankali, shiryawa don zuba jari da tsarin ficewa.
services_market_access_description: Shiryawa don fitarwa, gabatar da masu zuba jari na duniya da tallafi don faÉ—aÉ—a kasuwanci.
services_corporate_governance_descriptio: Shawarwari ga kwamitin gudanarwa, binciken bin doka da rubuceâ€‘rubuce don ingantaccen shugabanci.
services_police_clearance_description: Taimakon samun takardar shaida daga 'yan sanda na Afirka ta Kudu da Æ™yautata takardu tare da ofisoshin jakadanci.
services_office_supplies_description: Kayayyakin ofis masu araha, inganci da sauri isarwa. Ana iya yin odar tarin kaya ko na musamman.
services_funding_markets_description: Shawarwari kan tallafi/rance, shirya shawara, sadarwa da tallafi don fitarwa.
services_web_development_description: Gidajen yanar gizo na musamman, hanyoyin kasuwanci ta intanet, aikace-aikacen yanar gizo da tallafin kulawa mai ci gaba.
services_other_services_description: Taimako na musamman kan gudanarwa, doka da shawara.
footer_copyright: SubSaharan Investment Link Group. Duk haÆ™Æ™oÆ™in mallaka.
detail_market_entry_strategy_desc: Muna gudanar da kwatancen masu fafatawa da nazarin tasirin dokoki don tsara dabarun shiga kasuwa da suka dace. Ko don shiga manyan biranen Afirka ta Kudu ko kasuwannin SADC, abokan ciniki na samun binciken damar kasuwa, bayanan abokan ciniki, tsarin farashi, shirin rarrabawa da jagoranci na mataki-mataki don rage hadari da tabbatar da nasarar shiga kasuwa.
detail_business_planning_and_structuring: Daga tunani zuwa kaddamarwa, muna shirya cikakkun tsare-tsaren kasuwanci da ke dauke da hasashen kudi, tsarin kwararar kudi, nazarin SWOT da jadawalin cimma burin. Shawarwarinmu na tsari ya shafi nau'in kamfani (CC, Pty Ltd, NPC), yarjejeniyar masu hannun jari, tsarin shugabanci da la'akari da doka don tabbatar da kasuwanci mai dorewa da bin doka.
detail_board_advisory_services_desc: Muna tallafawa kwamitin gudanarwa wajen fayyace tsarin, rawar da kowa zai taka, alhakin da bambancin da ake bukata. Tsarinmu ya hada da tantance kwarewa, dokokin kwamitin, kayan kimanta aiki da shawarwari na dindindin don tabbatar da kulawa mai karfi, shugabanci nagari da daidaiton dabaru.
detail_compliance_audits_and_documentati: Ayyukan bincikenmu na duba tsarin aiki, bin dokar POPIA, Bâ€‘BBEE, dokar kwadago da ka'idojin masana'antu. Muna samar da nazarin gibin, hanyoyin gyara, samfuran manufofi da takardu masu shirye don duba ko samun takardar shaidar hukuma.
detail_saps_clearance_facilitation_desc: Muna kula da dukkan tsarin samun takardar shaidar 'yan sanda ta SAPSâ€”tara sawun yatsa, mika takardu, bin diddigi da karbar takardar cikin tsaroâ€”tare da tabbatar da sirri, sauri da rage wahalar aiki.
detail_dirco_apostille_legalisation_desc: Muna gudanar da tabbatar da takardu ta hanyar DIRCO da ofisoshin jakadanciâ€”takardun makaranta, affidavit, ikon lauya da takardun kamfaniâ€”don tabbatar da cewa sun dace da amfani a kasashen waje.
detail_affordable_office_stationery_desc: Ta hanyar masu kaya da aka tantance da rangwamen yawa, muna samar da kayan ofis masu mahimmanciâ€”kamar toner, takarda, kayan daki, na'urorin kwamfutaâ€”tare da duba inganci da isarwa cikin sauri.
detail_bulk_custom_orders_desc: Ya dace da taruka ko manyan shirye-shirye, muna tattauna farashi mai sauki, samar da kayayyaki na musamman (misali, tambari), tsara jadawalin samarwa, duba inganci da kula da isarwa daga farko har karshe.
detail_grants_loans_guidance_desc: Muna taimakawa wajen tantance cancanta, tattara takardu, tsara kasafin kudi da bin doka don neman tallafi daga SEDA, SMME Fund, shirye-shiryen tallafi na yankin da lamuni mai sauki.
detail_proposal_plan_preparation_desc: Kungiyarmu na rubuta shawarwari da tsare-tsaren kasuwanci masu karfi, tare da kwararan hujjoji, KPIs na kudi, sakamako mai auna da tsari mai dacewa da bukatun masu tallafawa.
detail_networking_partnerships_desc: Muna hada kai da cibiyoyin bunkasa kasuwanci, kungiyoyin masu zuba jari, tarukan masana'antu da abokan huldaâ€”don bude damammaki na jari, shawarwari da hadin gwiwa.
detail_export_readiness_support_desc: Muna tantance haraji, bukatun sufuri, kunshin kaya, bin doka da takardun fitarwa don tabbatar da cewa kasuwanci ya shirya shiga kasuwannin yankin ko na kasa da kasa.
detail_business_plan_development_desc: Muna hada kai wajen samar da tsare-tsaren kasuwanci masu jawo jari, ciki har da girman kasuwa, matsayi na samfur, hasashen kudaden shiga, yanayin hadari da jadawalin aiwatarwa don tallafawa samun jari ko kwangila.
detail_feasibility_studies_desc: Ta hanyar bincike na kwamfuta da na fili, muna tantance bukatar kasuwa, yanayin gasa, tsarin farashi, rukunin abokan ciniki da la'akari da dokoki don sababbin shirye-shirye ko kasuwanci.
detail_strategic_planning_growth_desc: Muna tsara taswirar bunkasa shekaru 3â€“5 da alamomin aiki, shirin albarkatu, bin diddigin ci gaba da hanyoyin fadada kasuwanci mai dorewa.
detail_tender_readiness_assessments_desc: Muna gudanar da duba cancantaâ€”takardu, lasisi, tsarin kula da kudi da takardun mika bukataâ€”don tabbatar da shirin shiga kwangila ta gwamnati ko masu zaman kansu.
detail_cipc_registration_desc: Muna gudanar da dukkan aikin rajistar kamfaniâ€”ajiye suna, rajistar CC, Pty Ltd, NPC, nada shugabanni/mambobi da cika dukkan takardun da ake bukata don fara aiki da sauri.
detail_annual_return_submissions_desc: Muna lura da lokutan mika rahoto, shirya bayanan kudi, cika da mika rahotannin shekara-shekara don tabbatar da bin doka da CIPC.
detail_sars_tax_registration_desc: Muna taimakawa wajen rajistar haraji (Income Tax, VAT, PAYE) da taimakawa wajen kafa tsarin haraji mai bin doka tun farko.
detail_bank_account_opening_desc: Muna jagorantar zaben banki, shirya takardu da hada kai da bankunaâ€”don saukaka bude asusun kasuwanci.
detail_bbbee_compliance_advisory_desc: Muna tantance mallaka, shugabanci, sayayya, bunkasa kwarewa; samar da taswirar bin doka da affidavit don daidaita kasuwancinku da dokar Bâ€‘BBEE.
detail_bbbee_certification_assistance_de: Muna tattara takardu, hada scorecard, hada kai da hukumomin SANAS da mika takardu don taimakawa wajen cimma ko wuce burin Bâ€‘BBEE.
detail_coida_uif_labour_registration_des: Muna rajistar kasuwancinku don COIDA, UIF da sauran bukatun doka na kwadago.
detail_licensing_industry_compliance_des: Daga lasisin giya, lafiya da tsaro, zuwa lasisin masana'antu, muna bincike, hada takardu, bin tsarin mika bukata da hada kai da hukumomi har a amince.
detail_business_valuation_services_desc: Ta amfani da hanyoyin kasuwa, DCF da na dukiya da suka dace da yanayin gida, muna samar da kimanta dukiya don samun jari, shirin kasuwanci ko ficewa.
detail_due_diligence_assessments_desc: Muna gudanar da bincike na kudi, doka, aiki da bin dokaâ€”gano gibin da samar da shirin gyara don karfafa amincewar masu zuba jari.
detail_investment_readiness_coaching_des: Ta horo na dabaru, muna inganta takardun gabatarwa, tsarin kudi da gabatarwaâ€”don tabbatar da kwarewa da shirin fuskantar masu jari ko masu ba da rance.
detail_exit_strategy_planning_desc: Muna taimakawa tsara dabarun ficewaâ€”ta hanyar M&A, IPO, sayen shugabanni ko sayarwaâ€”ta hanyar inganta tsarin yarjejeniya, lokaci, kimantawa da hanyoyin gado.
detail_export_readiness_investor_intro_d: Muna samar da jerin duba bin doka na fitarwa, tsarin sufuri, takardun jawo jariâ€”da hada ku da masu zuba jari da abokan kasuwanci na kasa da kasa.
detail_cross_border_expansion_desc: Muna ba da shawarwari na doka, dokoki, abokan hulda da rarrabawa don shiga kasuwannin SADC da Afirka baki dayaâ€”tare da tsara wakilci na gida da daidaita kasuwa.
detail_joint_venture_acquisition_desc: Muna tallafawa gano abokan hulda, tsara yarjejeniya, kimantawa, tattaunawa, binciken doka da shirin hade kasuwanci ko saye.
detail_custom_website_development_desc: Muna Æ™irÆ™ira gidajen yanar gizo masu amsawa, na zamani waÉ—anda suka dace da alamar ku da burin kasuwancinkuâ€”ciki har da ingantaccen wayar hannu, mafi kyawun ayyukan SEO, da tsarin sarrafa abun ciki mai sauÆ™in amfani.
detail_ecommerce_solutions_desc: Muna gina dandamali na kasuwanci ta yanar gizo masu cikakken bayani tare da Æ™ofofin biyan kuÉ—i masu tsaro, sarrafa kayan ajiya, bin diddigin oda, da haÉ—awa tare da hanyoyin biyan kuÉ—i na gida don kasuwar Afirka.
detail_web_application_development_desc: Muna haÉ“aka aikace-aikacen yanar gizo na musamman ta amfani da fasahohin zamaniâ€”daga tsarin sarrafa kasuwanci zuwa Æ™ofofin abokan cinikiâ€”waÉ—anda aka tsara don faÉ—aÉ—awa da ingantaccen aiki.
detail_website_maintenance_support_desc: Muna ba da tallafin fasaha mai ci gaba, sabuntawar tsaro, sarrafa abun ciki, ingantaccen aiki, da ajiyar yau da kullum don tabbatar da cewa gidan yanar gizon ku yana aiki cikin sauÆ™i.
detail_customized_admin_legal_consulting: Muna tsara tallafi na musammanâ€”daga rubuta kwangila, kulawa da aiki na wucin gadi, shawarwarin doka, zuwa gudanar da ayyuka na musammanâ€”daidai da bukatun kungiyarku.
book_banner_description: The past always finds its way home. A haunting novel exploring family trauma, generational scars, and the hope of breaking painful cycles.
